TopicTitle: Quick buttons or keys to reach individual parts of the KSC easier

Articles.Content:
I didn't see any post like this in the search, so here it goes:

Everytime I load a save and I am at my spaceship, if I want to do anything else, I have to go first to the SC, then to the VAB, then load my ship.

This is quite frustrating if I have to switch between flight and ship edit several times in a row.

Why shouldn't we have some buttons that lead to other buildings directly?
